name: falling_Squirrel
description:
you are a squirrel, and you need to get down fom a tree by using the leafs.

the leafs disappeared 0.4 seconds after you tuch it , there are 4 kind of leafs: green - normal, yellow(hot) - if you tuch you lose 1 lives, red(very verry hot) - if you tuch you lose 4 lives, blue - give you a point.

you start with 5 lives, the amount of each leaves Changes due to 4 levels, with the points you can buy stuff like: lives, blue give more points and more.

you can get extra points if you do challenges, and you can change your skin.

you can save your game in the computer and load later.
